channel.title: How could i make a donater shop form this code?a shop that lets only donaters tr

item.title: How could i make a donater shop form this code?a shop that lets only donaters tr
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

if(variable1 == int1) && (variable2 == int2) { // Open shop. else // Send message. }

Variable1 = The variable that indicates what the NPC’s ID is.
Int1 = The NPC’s ID.
Variable 2 = The variable that indicates whether or not a player is a donor.
Int2 = Indicates whether or not the player is a donor.
// Open shop. = Make the shop open.
else = If the conditions don’t apply.
// Send a message. = Send the message if the player is not a donor.

Read full topic
